author: archyde
title: Withdrawal of Mali from ECOWAS: the opposition denounces an “illegitimate” decision - Archyde
text: 2024-02-01 21:13:33 Published on : The Malian opposition denounces an “illegitimate” and “without consultation” decision after Mali’s withdrawal from ECOWAS. A choice of the ruling junta which wanted to protest against the sanctions imposed by the regional body demanding a rapid return of civilians to power. Other countries such as Niger and Burkina Faso have also left the organization. The Senegalese National Assembly approved on Wednesday, during tense debates, the creation of a commission of inquiry targeting the Constitutional Council. The request for the creation of this commission was initiated by the coalition of Karim Wade, a personality disqualified from the next presidential election by the body. The coalition calls into question the integrity of two members of the Council. In Ivory Coast, during the CAN, beyond football, it is also an opportunity for players to convey strong messages. Some are committed to fighting against illegal migration. The phenomenon affects thousands of young Ivorians every year.
